LanguageData.RavenRace_Settings_HybridizationDesc: Configure rules for hybrid ravens inheriting abilities from other races.
LanguageData.RavenRace_Settings_EnableMiliraCompat_De: If enabled, ravens with Milira bloodline will gain movement speed bonus and reduced aiming time.
LanguageData.RavenRace_Settings_EnableMoeLotlCompat_D: If enabled, ravens with MoeLotl bloodline will gain cultivation abilities.
LanguageData.RavenRace_Settings_EnableKoelimeBloodlin: If enabled, ravens with Koelime bloodline will gain regeneration and immunity to diseases.
LanguageData.RavenRace_Settings_EnableMuGirlCompat_De: If enabled, ravens with MooGirl bloodline (regardless of gender) will gain armor bonuses and the ability to produce milk.
LanguageData.RavenRace_GatherMilkDesc: Gather the accumulated milk from this Raven.
LanguageData.RavenRace_Settings_MuffaloPrank_Desc: An old story about a chicken and a muffalo... oh my, what a tragic couple!\n\n(Enables Force Lovin on vanilla Muffalos, treating them as MooGirls)
LanguageData.RavenRace_Settings_EnableWolfeinCompat_D: If enabled, ravens with Wolfein bloodline will gain lesser Night and Moon phase buffs.
LanguageData.RavenRace_Settings_EnableDragonianCompat: If enabled, ravens with Dragonian bloodline will produce dragon milk.
LanguageData.RavenRace_Settings_EnableMoyoCompat_Desc: If enabled, ravens with Moyo bloodline will produce Blue Serum and be immune to Deep Blue addiction/side effects.
LanguageData.RavenRace_Settings_EnableEponaCompat_Des: If enabled, ravens with Epona bloodline gain speed bonuses and enhanced charge ability.
LanguageData.RavenRace_AbilityDesc_EnhancedCharge: A perfect blend of Epona speed and MooGirl strength.
LanguageData.RavenRace_Settings_EnableTailinCompat_De: If enabled, ravens with Tailin bloodline gain combat instincts.
LanguageData.RavenRace_Settings_EnableCinderCompat_De: If enabled, ravens with Cinder bloodline will gain "Polymer Regeneration".
LanguageData.RavenRace_Settings_EnableMiraboreasCompa: If enabled, ravens with Miraboreas bloodline gain stagger immunity and melee cleave attacks.
LanguageData.RavenRace_Settings_EnableMinchoCompat_De: If enabled, ravens with Mincho bloodline gain extreme cold resistance (-500C) and produce Mint Choco.
LanguageData.Milira_Flight_Toggle_Desc: Toggle flight ability.\n\nWhile flying, can bypass deep water and walls (with patch), but continuously drains hunger.
LanguageData.Milira_Flight_Mode_Desc:
Switch flight altitude.

【Low】: Only fly while moving, can fly over buildings but not roofs.
【High】: Always flying, can fly over roofs but not solid buildings.
